attributes.long-description:
One hundred years from tomorrow...World War IV has erupted across the star system and you assume the role of a spacefighter pilot in the middle of the action.! Do you have what it takes to join the United Star Force and defend Earth and it's colonies from the relentless marauders of the Non-Aligned Nations? With a selection of over thirty spacefighters, bombers and transports and a complement of weapons and equipment at your disposal, can you take the fight to the enemy and win the war?

STARLIGHT INCEPTION is a relevant 1st / 3rd person space combat experience with elements of exploration. Features include fighter based combat that takes you from space to the surface of planets and moons and back again, an immersive single-player story-based campaign, and a single player 3D tower defense Fly Patrol campaign. Between combat operations, explore the decks of your mothership, in an interactive first person mode. Online Multiplayer dogfighting missions activating in the near future...

1 player(s)
Network Players 2-8
Network Features
13312KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Motion Sensor
Microphone

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be solely used by this Sony Entertainment Network account on up to 2 activated PlayStation systems, with no more than 1 activated device within a 24 hour period.  Content may not be used by any other account.  Please see software description for device compatibility.
